rules_text:
Area 99 – Archives enters tapped.
When Area 99 – Archives enters, create a copy of Stored in the Archives. You may cast the copy. [i](It’s a {2}{W} Aura enchantment with “Enchant creature or planeswalker” and “Enchanted permanent can’t attack or block, and its activated abilities can’t be activated.”)[/i]
{T}: Add {W}.
